<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.62
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Positions

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the position of the object other units can aim to.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''aimPos''' object

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - format [[PositionASL]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>'''aimPos''' [[player]]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[eyePos]], [[getPosASL]], [[weaponDirection]], [[unitAimPosition]], [[unitAimPositionVisual]]
</value></part></template>
